name: Rex Tillerson
summary: Former Secretary of State and ExxonMobil CEO who was fired by Trump via tweet and later called Trump 'undisciplined' and a 'moron' who doesn't like to read.

keyStatements.quote: I will be honest with you, it troubles me deeply as a citizen that the president of the United States wants to weaponize the Department of Justice in order to go after people. That is not how you strengthen democracy, that is how you weaken it.

He doesn't like to read. He doesn't read briefing reports. He doesn't like to get into the details of a lot of things. He's pretty undisciplined, doesn't like to read, doesn't read briefing reports, doesn't like to get into the details.

What was challenging for me coming from the disciplined, highly process-oriented Exxon Mobil corporation is to go to work for a man who is pretty undisciplined, doesn't like to read, doesn't read briefing reports, doesn't like to get into the details of a lot of things.

timeline.significance: Denied but did not dispute the substance

credibility.background: Former Secretary of State, former CEO of ExxonMobil, extensive international business experience
awards: Boy Scouts Distinguished Eagle Scout Award
